TopicTitle: Can we resize/change the Imgur album frame?

Articles.Content:
First of all: yay for the ability to paste Imgur albums being back again. But can we please talk about how those albums look? Is there any way to change that?

In particular, is there anything we can do about resizing the default 'mini-polaroid' frame, so we are not forced to click away from the forum just to be able to see/read any of the pertinent details someone is trying to show in the pictures?

The way it is now, we're gonna have to circumvent the miniaturization by pasting individual image links so they show at a readable size... in essence invalidating the album feature.

 

(and preferably: can we just get rid of that polaroid frame altogether?)
Talk to the imgur people, they killed the old (and IMO better) album embeds in favor of this new format, we don't really get a say in it.

8 hours ago, Red Iron Crown said:

I was afraid that'd be the response. Oh well. Back to spoiler tags and individual links it is then.
